thread.title: Arsene Wenger holds further talks over Arsenal future - but new deal NOT signed yet
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger holds further talks over Arsenal future - but new deal NOT signed yet

author: John Cross
title: Arsene Wenger holds further talks over Arsenal future - but new deal NOT signed yet
text:
Wenger looks set to overhaul his squad this summer (Photo: PA) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsene Wenger has held further talks over his future this week as he is set to commit to a new two year contract. 
Mirror Sport understands talks are ongoing with majority shareholder Stan Kroenke and other members of the club's hierarchy. 
Wenger went to Paris on the international break but has also been in regular contact with Kroenke who is keen for him to stay and oversee a drastic rebuild at the Emirates. 
Gunners boss Wenger has agreed a new two year deal but has NOT signed yet with the club insisting the final decision will be mutual. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
